jobActions.name: Hard Slash
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 300.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Syphon Strike
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 240.
Combo Action: Hard Slash
Combo Potency: 380
Combo Bonus: Restores MP
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Unleash
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 120 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Grit
jobActions.description:
Significantly increases enmity generation.
Effect ends upon reuse.

jobActions.name: Release Grit
jobActions.description: Cancels the effect of Grit.

jobActions.name: Unmend
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 150.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity
Additional Effect: Reduces the recast time of Shadowstride by 5 seconds
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Souleater
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 260.
Combo Action: Syphon Strike
Combo Potency: 480
Combo Bonus: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 300
Combo Bonus: Increases Blood Gauge by 20
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Flood of Darkness
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Additional Effect: Grants Darkside, increasing damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 30s
Extends Darkside duration by 30s to a maximum of 60s.
Shares a recast timer with Edge of Darkness.

jobActions.name: Blood Weapon
jobActions.description:
Grants 3 stacks of Blood Weapon, each stack increasing Blood Gauge by 10 and restoring MP upon landing weaponskills or spells.
Duration: 15s
Effect does not stack when hitting multiple targets with a single attack.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Shadow Wall
jobActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by 30%.
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Stalwart Soul
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 120 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity
Combo Action: Unleash
Combo Potency: 160
Combo Bonus: Restores MP
Combo Bonus: Increases Blood Gauge by 20
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Edge of Darkness
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 300.
Additional Effect: Grants Darkside, increasing damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 30s
Extends Darkside duration by 30s to a maximum of 60s.
Shares a recast timer with Flood of Darkness.

jobActions.name: Dark Mind
jobActions.description:
Reduces magic vulnerability by 20%.
Duration: 10s

jobActions.name: Living Dead
jobActions.description:
Grants the effect of Living Dead.
When HP is reduced to 0 while under the effect of Living Dead, instead of becoming KO'd, your status will change to Walking Dead.
Living Dead Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Restores HP with each weaponskill successfully delivered or spell cast
Cure Potency: 1500
While under the effect of Walking Dead, most attacks will not lower your HP below 1. If, before the Walking Dead timer runs out, an amount of HP totaling your maximum HP is restored, the effect will change to Undead Rebirth. If this amount is not restored, you will be KO'd.
Walking Dead Duration: 10s
While under the effect of Undead Rebirth, most attacks will not lower your HP below 1.
Undead Rebirth Duration: Time remaining on Walking Dead

jobActions.name: Salted Earth
jobActions.description:
Creates a patch of salted earth at your feet, dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 50 to any enemies who enter.
Duration: 15s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Shadowstride
jobActions.description:
Rush to a targeted enemy's location.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity
Maximum Charges: 2
Cannot be executed while bound.

jobActions.name: Abyssal Drain
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 240 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 200
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Shares a recast timer with Carve and Spit.

jobActions.name: Carve and Spit
jobActions.description:
Delivers a threefold attack with a potency of 540.
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Shares a recast timer with Abyssal Drain.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Bloodspiller
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 580.
Blood Gauge Cost: 50
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Quietus
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 240 to all nearby enemies.
Blood Gauge Cost: 50
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Delirium
jobActions.description:
Grants 3 stacks of Delirium and Blood Weapon.
Delirium Effect: Changes Bloodspiller to Scarlet Delirium and Quietus to Impalement
Duration: 15s
Blood Weapon Effect: Each stack increases Blood Gauge by 10 and restores MP upon landing weaponskills or spells
Duration: 15s
Effect does not stack when hitting multiple targets with a single attack.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: The Blackest Night
jobActions.description:
Creates a barrier around self or target party member that absorbs damage totaling 25% of target's maximum HP.
Duration: 7s
Grants Dark Arts when barrier is completely absorbed.
Dark Arts Effect: Consume Dark Arts instead of MP to execute Edge of Shadow or Flood of Shadow

jobActions.name: Flood of Shadow
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 160 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Additional Effect: Grants Darkside, increasing damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 30s
Extends Darkside duration by 30s to a maximum of 60s.
Shares a recast timer with Edge of Shadow.

jobActions.name: Edge of Shadow
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 460.
Additional Effect: Grants Darkside, increasing damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 30s
Extends Darkside duration by 30s to a maximum of 60s.
Shares a recast timer with Flood of Shadow.

jobActions.name: Dark Missionary
jobActions.description:
Reduces magic damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%.
Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Living Shadow
jobActions.description:
Conjure a simulacrum of your darkside to fight alongside you.
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Grants Scorn
Duration: 30s
Simulacrum Attack Potency: 420
Additional Effect: Simulacrum is able to execute Shadowbringer and Disesteem
Shadowbringer Potency: 570 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies
Disesteem Potency: 620 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Oblation
jobActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by target party member or self by 10%.
Duration: 10s
Maximum Charges: 2

jobActions.name:
Salt and Darkness
Prerequisite Quest
jobActions.description:
All enemies standing in the corrupted patch of Salted Earth take additional unaspected damage with a potency of 500 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

jobActions.name: Shadowbringer
jobActions.description:
Deals unaspected damage to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Maximum Charges: 2
Can only be executed while under the effect of Darkside.

jobActions.name: Shadowed Vigil
jobActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by 40%.
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Grants Vigilant
Duration: 20s
Vigilant Effect: Restores HP when HP falls below 50% or upon effect duration expiration
Cure Potency: 1,200

jobActions.name: Scarlet Delirium
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 600.
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Can only be executed while under the effect of Delirium.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Bloodspiller changes to Scarlet Delirium while under the effect of Delirium.

jobActions.name: Comeuppance
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 700.
Combo Action: Scarlet Delirium
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Can only be executed while under the effect of Delirium.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Scarlet Delirium changes to Comeuppance when requirements for execution are met.

jobActions.name: Torcleaver
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 800.
Combo Action: Comeuppance
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Can only be executed while under the effect of Delirium.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Comeuppance changes to Torcleaver when requirements for execution are met.

jobActions.name: Impalement
jobActions.description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 320 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Can only be executed while under the effect of Delirium.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Quietus changes to Impalement when requirements for execution are met.

jobActions.name: Disesteem
jobActions.description:
Deals physical damage to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 1,000 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed while Scorn is active.

roleActions.name: Rampart
roleActions.description:
Reduces damage taken by 20%.
Additional Effect: Increases HP recovery via healing actions on self by 15%
Duration: 20s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

roleActions.name: Provoke
roleActions.description: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list while gaining additional enmity.

roleActions.name: Interject
roleActions.description: Interrupts the use of a target's action.

roleActions.name: Reprisal
roleActions.description:
Reduces damage dealt by nearby enemies by 10%.
Duration: 15s
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

roleActions.name: Arm's Length
roleActions.description:
Creates a barrier nullifying most knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 6s
Additional Effect: Slow +20% when barrier is struck
Duration: 15s

roleActions.name: Shirk
roleActions.description: Diverts 25% of enmity to target party member.

traits.name: Tank Mastery
traits.description: Reduces damage taken by 20%. Furthermore, grants a bonus to maximum HP based on your vitality attribute, and a bonus to damage dealt based on your strength attribute.

traits.name: Blackblood
traits.description: Allows for Blood Gauge accumulation upon the landing of certain actions.

traits.name: Enhanced Blackblood
traits.description: Allows for Blood Gauge accumulation upon the landing of any weaponskill or spell while under the effect of Blood Weapon.

traits.name: Darkside Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Flood of Darkness and Edge of Darkness to Flood of Shadow and Edge of Shadow respectively.

traits.name: Enhanced Unmend
traits.description:
Reduces recast time of Shadowstride by 5 seconds when executing Unmend on most targets.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Melee Mastery
traits.description:
Increases the potency of Hard Slash to 180, Syphon Strike to 120, and Souleater to 140.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Enhanced Living Shadow
traits.description:
Increases the potency of attacks dealt by your simulacrum to 420.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Enhanced Living Shadow II
traits.description:
Upgrades Flood of Shadow executed by your simulacrum to Shadowbringer, which delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before it with a potency of 570 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies.
Revisions (Patch 6.5x - Patch 7.05)

traits.name: Shadow Wall Mastery
traits.description: Upgrades Shadow Wall to Shadowed Vigil.

traits.name: Melee Mastery II
traits.description: Increases the potency of Hard Slash to 300, Syphon Strike to 240, Souleater to 260, Stalwart Soul to 120, Carve and Spit to 540, Bloodspiller to 580, and Quietus to 240.

traits.name: Enhanced Delirium
traits.description: Upgrades Bloodspiller and Quietus to Scarlet Delirium and Impalement respectively.

traits.name: Enhanced Living Shadow III
traits.description:
Grants the effect of Scorn after executing Living Shadow.
Duration: 30s

Additionally upgrades Carve and Spit executed by your simulacrum to Disesteem, which delivers an attack to all enemies in a straight line before it with a potency of 620 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies.
